description: Documentation for 5.5.5. im2col::w and im2col::w::128 modes

files.title: Overview
files.summary: These modes are similar to the im2col mode with the restriction that elements are accessed across the `W` dimension only while keeping the `H` and `D` dimension constant.

files.title: 5.5.5.1. Bounding Box
files.summary: In these modes, the size of the bounding box in `D` and `H` dimensions are 1.

files.title: 5.5.5.2. Traversal Stride
files.summary: This is similar to im2col mode with the exception of that the number of elements traversed along only the `W` dimension is strided by the traversal stride as specified in the TensorMap.

files.title: 5.5.5.3. wHalo
files.summary: In `im2col::w` mode, the `wHalo` argument in the PTX instruction specifies how many filter halo elements must be loaded at the end of the image.

files.title: 5.5.5.4. wOffset
files.summary: In the convolution calculations, the same elements along the `W` dimension are reused for different locations within the convolution filter footprint.
